Awesome, thanks for uploading. I'm not sure what happened to my legit DVD of it. I've still got the case, but can't find the disc for the life of me.

Oh, and for anybody who has not seen this film.. what the hell are you waiting for?? Get it!! However, be warned. This is not a conventional movie where you can sit and have an enjoyable relaxing couple of hours.

This is a raw, visceral, and utterly heartbreaking experience that ripped my soul out through my anus and curbstomped it into the pavement. Without lube!

Some people don't like Aronofsky's directing style, but I still have yet to have somebody tell me they aren't glad that they've seen it.

For me, this is a 9 of 10 at the very least. It's worth seeing for Ellen Burstyn's legendary and powerful performance as Sara Goldfarb.
